channel.title: PvM Ranged Disconnection

item.title: PvM Ranged Disconnection
item.dc:creator: @josh1993nhs josh1993nhs
item.description:
@josh1993nhs wrote:

When Using any Ranged In Player Vs Npc, I Get this error, But the ranged works perfectly Fine in PvP.

Error with player 5, X x x
java.lang.NullPointerException
at client.AttackNPC(client.java:7627)
at client.process(client.java:18577)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:278)
at process.run(process.java:23)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
Game saved for player X x x

	if(UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing){
	client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
		followID = AttackingOn2.playerId;
	if(GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 8) == false){
		sM("You are too far to range your enemy!");
		ResetAttack();
	return false;

}
}

Read full topic
